name: Mad Rock Safeguard Belay Device
short_description: Material: aircraft-grade aluminum, stainless steel
Type: assisted brake
Rope Diameter: [rescue/rigging] 8.1 - 11mm [climbing] 8.9 - 11mm

product_description: The Mad Rock Safeguard Loleoks strikingly similar to Mad Rock's assisted braking Lifeguard belay device with the exception of a springless interior, making it more applicable for rescue and rigging work as well as climbing. A springless design increases the Safeguard's Loleck onto ropes to give you the extra confidence needed for rope soLoles, rescue work, or even standard belays. It shouldn't creep or slide down the rope like the spring-Loleaded Lifeguard or other assisted braking devices.

product_description: Does it need an introduction? GRIGRI sets the standard for belay devices. In the gym or at the crag, it makes belaying easier with cam-assisted blocking. Perfect for working your project!

name: PETZL GRIGRI Belay Device - Belay Device with Cam-Assisted Blocking for Sport, Trad, and Top-Rope Climbing
short_description: PROGRESSIVE DESCENT CONTROL: 3:1 mechanical advantage of the camming mechanism helps smoothly control the rope and reduce lowering efforts regardless of rope diameter.
CAM-ASSISTED BLOCKING: Cam-assisted blocking ensures a comfortable belay—when the climber falls or weights the rope—the cam in the device automatically cinches down to arrest the rope.

COMFORTABLE and CONVENIENT: Simple to use for belaying both lead and top rope climbers. Rope installation diagram engraved on the inside and outside of the device serves as a friendly reminder to novices and experts alike.
TWIST-LOCK: Automatic locking, optimal for connecting lanyards and connecting a GRIGRI to the harness.

LIGHTWEIGHT PERFORMANCE: D-shape is functional regardless of orientation, meeting multiple uses: attachment of a belay system, a pulley, or on the end of a lanyard. Light enough for mountains, durable enough for the crag.
product_description: Does it need an introduction? GRIGRI sets the standard for belay devices. In the gym or at the crag, it makes belaying easier with cam-assisted blocking. Equipped with an ergonomic handle, providing easy control for a smooth and comfortable descent for the climber. Compact and lightweight, it can be used with single ropes from 8.5 to 11 mm. Perfect for working your project! Sm’D is a D-shaped locking carabiner that is lightweight, compact, and can be used in numerous climbing situations; it is easy to manipulate, even when wearing gloves, and is available in three locking system versions: SCREW-LOCK, TWIST-LOCK, and TRIACT-LOCK. SCREW-LOCK features a red band provides a visual warning when the carabiner is unlocked. This system is suitable for harsh environments where contaminants (mud, ice) could cause an automatic locking system to jam. TWIST-LOCK and TRIACT-LOCK offer quick opening for use at the end of a lanyard or connecting a GRIGRI to the harness.

name: BLACK DIAMOND ATC Belay Rappel Device | Durable Aluminum, Easy-Handling Device for Sport & Gym Rock Climbing
short_description: ASSISTED-BRAKING SECURITY: Provides added control when catching falls, offering a more secure belay experience compared to standard tube-style devices. Ideal for sport climbers and gym use.
SMOOTH, PREDICTABLE ROPE HANDLING: Engineered for controlled lowering and clean rope feed while belaying a leader. Allows seamless transitions between taking in slack and paying it out quickly.
ERGONOMIC, EASY-TO-USE DESIGN: Intuitive handling makes it suitable for new and experienced climbers. Large thumb surface improves lowering comfort and fine control during descents.
DURABLE STEEL CONSTRUCTION: Stainless-steel wear plate enhances longevity and resists rope friction over time. Built to withstand heavy use during regular training and projecting.
COMPATIBLE WITH POPULAR ROPE DIAMETERS: Works with single ropes from approximately 8.7–10.5 mm, making it versatile for modern indoor and outdoor climbing setups.
product_description: An essential belay/rappel package, featuring the redesigned ATC-XP. Package includes belay device and locking carabiner.

short_description: [Material]: Aluminium and Magnesium alloy forging. Weight:belay device: 60g / 0.132lb.

name: 50KN Rescue Figure, 8 Descender Large Bent-Ear Belaying and Rappelling Gear Belay Device Climbing for Rock Climbing Peak Rescue 7075 Aluminum Alloy
short_description: Keep Your Safety: It uses the friction between the rope and the Descender device to slow down the descent or brake. Extra thick with ears and belay slot will keep your safety, even in a rescue or emergency situation.
Superior Braking Resistance: Breaking strength 11,000 lbf (50KN/5000kg). Allows for smooth rope action while descending or belaying, offers superb control on rope.
Figure 8 Descender: Big Wall Climbings Terminal 8 with Ears is an improvement over standard figure 8 devices with improved breaking and safety features.
EASY LOCK-OFF: With bent-ear, locking yourself off with both hands free will be much easier and safer.
It Applies To: Suitable for Mountain Climbing, Rock Climbing, Ice Climbing, Rescue, Working-At-Height, Technical Rope Rescue, Climbers, Cavers and Sport Rappelers

name: BLACK DIAMOND ATC Guide Belay Rappel Device | Multi-Mode Friction | Auto-Block Capability | Versatile Belay Tool for Trad & Multi-Pitch Rock Climbing
short_description: VERSATILE BELAY & RAPPEL PERFORMANCE: Designed for belaying one or two climbers and for smooth, controlled rappelling. Ideal for trad, multi-pitch, alpine, and guiding applications where reliability is essential.
AUTO-BLOCK MODE FOR MULTI-PITCH CLIMBS: Auto-block functionality allows secure belaying of one or two seconding climbers from the anchor. Provides added control and safety on technical routes.
MULTI-MODE FRICTION CONTROL: High-friction and low-friction modes accommodate a wide range of rope diameters, offering smooth handling for rappels and precise control when catching falls.

LIGHTWEIGHT, DURABLE CONSTRUCTION: Hot-forged aluminum body balances strength and weight for long routes and demanding terrain. Engineered to withstand repeated use on rock, alpine walls, and guiding days.
ROPE COMPATIBILITY & EFFICIENT HANDLING: Works with ropes from approximately 8.1–11mm, delivering smooth feed and reliable braking. Ideal for modern half, twin, or single rope systems.

name: BLACK DIAMOND Big Air XP Belay Package | ATC-XP Device & Screwgate Carabiner | Reliable Belay Kit for Sport & Trad Rock Climbing
short_description: COMPLETE BELAY SETUP: Includes the ATC-XP belay/rappel device paired with a RockLock locking carabiner for a ready-to-use belay package. Ideal for new climbers building a reliable kit or experienced climbers upgrading gear.

ATC-XP WITH HIGH-FRICTION MODE: Engineered with two friction modes for enhanced stopping power and controlled lowering. Provides up to three times greater holding force, improving handling on steep or multi-pitch routes.
ROCKLOCK LOCKING CARABINER: Large HMS-style locker delivers smooth rope flow and secure belay performance. Features a keylock nose for snag-free clipping and a comfortable ergonomic shape.
DURABLE, CLIMB-READY CONSTRUCTION: Hot-forged aluminum ATC-XP excels in repeated use, while the RockLock’s strong frame offers long-term reliability at the gym, crag, or in alpine terrain.

VERSATILE FOR BELAY & RAPPEL: Works with a wide range of rope diameters for single-pitch, multi-pitch, and general climbing. A dependable system for belaying partners, rappelling, or top-rope sessions.
